annotations.description:
WildFly 17 runtime dependencies image based on CentOS 7. For more information about using this image, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/wildfly/wildfly-s2i/blob/master/README.md.

WARNING: By selecting this tag, your application will automatically update to use the latest version of WildFly available on OpenShift, including major versions updates.

WildFly 17 runtime dependencies image based on CentOS 7. For more information about using this image, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/wildfly/wildfly-s2i/blob/master/README.md.
